name: search_books
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool project_gutenberg_api.
Tool description: This is a stable and reliable unofficial API for Project Gutenberg, allowing you to download ebooks as well as get information about a certain book (title, author, language, copyrights and publish date).
API description: Search for books on Project Gutenberg using a given search term and return the search results as JSON or text.

term.description: The search term to use for finding books.
